message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
My turn to be reasonable, Alice. Think carefully, inflation is eating away at this deal!
Don't be greedy, Bob. This offer is fair considering the time pressure.
Time is running out Alice, and our potential gains are shrinking! This is my final offer.
This is getting ridiculous Bob, let's just split it fairly and get out of here!
Alice, my patience is wearing thin. This is more than fair, especially considering the inflation. Take it or leave it.
